MARK 16.10 soh gaggandei gataih þaim miþ imma wisandam, qainondam jah gretandam.
MARK 16.11 jah eis hausjandans þatei libaiþ jah gasaiƕans warþ fram izai, ni galaubidedun.
MARK 16.12 afaruh þan þata... ...twaim ize ataugiþs warþ in anþaramma farwa, gaggandam du wehsa:
MARK 16.13 jah jainai galeiþandans gataihun þaim anþaraim;
niþþaim galaubidedun.
MARK 16.14 bi spedistin þan anakumbjandam þaim ainlibim ataugida, jah idweitida ungalaubein ize jah harduhairtein, unte þaim gasaiƕandam ina urrisanana, ni galaubidedun.
MARK 16.15 jah qaþ du im:
gaggandans in þo manaseþ alakjo, merjaiþ þo aiwaggeljon allai þizai gaskaftai.
MARK 16.16 jah sa galaubjands ufdaupiþs ganisiþ;
iþ saei ni galaubeiþ, afdomjada.
MARK 16.17 aþþan taikns þaim galaubjandam þata afargaggiþ:
in namin meinamma unhulþons uswairpand:
razdom rodjand niujaim, MARK 16.18 waurmans nimand, jah jabai ingibe ƕa drigkaina, ni þauh im agljai;
ana unhailans handuns uslagjand, jah waila wairþiþ im.
MARK 16.19 þanuh þan frauja Iesus afar þatei rodida du im, usnumans warþ in himin jah gasat af taihswon gudis.
MARK 16.20 iþ jainai usgaggandans meridedun and allata miþ fraujin gawaurstwin jah þata waurd tulgjandin þairh þos afargaggandeins taiknins.
amen.
MARK Explicit.0 Aiwaggeljo þairh Marku ustauh.
wulþus þus weiha guþ.
amen.
LUKE Incipit.0 Aiwaggeljo þairh Lukan anastodeiþ.

LUKE 1.1 Unte raihtis managai dugunnun meljan insaht bi þos gafullaweisidons in uns waihtins, LUKE 1.2 swaswe anafulhun unsis þaiei fram frumistin silbasiunjos jah andbahtos wesun þis waurdis; LUKE 1.3 galeikaida jah mis fram anastodeinai allaim glaggwuba afarlaistjandin gahahjo þus meljan, batista Þaiaufeilu, LUKE 1.4 ei gakunnais þize bi þoei galaisiþs is waurde staþ.
LUKE 1.5 was in dagam Herodes þiudanis Iudaias gudja namin Zakarias, us afaram Abijins, jah qeins is us dauhtrum Aharons, jah namo izos Aileisabaiþ.
LUKE 1.6 wesunuh þan garaihta ba in andwairþja gudis, gaggandona in allaim anabusnim jah garaihteim fraujins unwaha.
LUKE 1.7 jah ni was im barne, unte was Aileisabaiþ stairo, jah ba framaldra dage seinaize wesun.

LUKE 1.8 warþ þan, miþþanei gudjinoda is in wikon kunjis seinis in andwairþja gudis, LUKE 1.9 bi biuhtja gudjinassaus hlauts imma urrann du saljan, atgaggands in alh fraujins, LUKE 1.10 jah alls hiuhma was manageins beidandans uta ƕeilai þwmiamins.
LUKE 1.11 warþ þan imma in siunai aggilus fraujins standands af taihswon hunslastadis þwmiamins.
LUKE 1.12 jah gadrobnoda Zakarias gasaiƕands, jah agis disdraus ina.
LUKE 1.13 qaþ þan du imma sa aggilus:
ni ogs þus, Zakaria, duþe ei andhausida ist bida þeina, jah qens þeina Aileisabaiþ gabairid sunu þus, jah haitais namo is Iohannen.
LUKE 1.14 jah wairþiþ þus faheds jah swegniþa, jah managai in gabaurþai is faginond.

LUKE 1.15 wairþiþ auk mikils in andwairþja fraujins jah wein jah leiþu ni drigkid jah ahmins weihis gafulljada nauhþan in wambai aiþeins seinaizos, LUKE 1.16 jah managans suniwe Israelis gawandeiþ du fraujin guda ize.
LUKE 1.17 jah silba fauraqimid in andwairþja is in ahmin jah mahtai Haileiins gawandjan hairtona attane du barnam jah untalans in frodein garaihtaize, manwjan fraujin managein gafahrida.
LUKE 1.18 jah qaþ Zakarias du þamma aggilau:
biƕe kunnum þata?
ik raihtis im sineigs, jah qens meina framaldrozei in dagam seinaim.
LUKE 1.19 jah andhafjands sa aggilus qaþ du imma:
ik im Gabriel sa standands in andwairþja gudis, jah insandiþs im rodjan du þus jah wailamerjan þus þata.
LUKE 1.20 jah sai sijais þahands jah ni magands rodjan und þana dag ei wairþai þata, duþe ei ni galaubides waurdam meinaim, þoei usfulljanda in mela seinamma.
